TopicTitle: 1.12.1 - How to use 10m inflatable heat shield - right click has no controls, no staging or on/off switch?

Articles.Content:
Vers. 1.12.1 See title- Dont know if this is bugged..  anyone?

 

How to use 10m inflatable heat shield - right click has no controls, no staging or on/off switch ?
Is something attached to the lower node? It won't deploy if there is anything attached to the pointy end, and/or the cylindrical shroud is still in place.

Ok, I got it now.  I was in the VAB and also had it upside down / and / or attached to things while building stuff..  and didnt know what I was doing..

But you got me squared away, thanks.
